name: Survival School
description:
The movement of your school of your fish are all connected.

You control a school of 20 fish and have to survive for a minute. Dodge starfish, trash, harpoons, sharks, eels, bubbles and crabs to survive and reach the coral reef

Controls:
a/d or right/left arrows - turn
w or up arrow - move forward
The fish will move at different times, but will do the same movements.

Depending on how many fish you ended up with, here's how you did:
1: You narrowly won!
2: The fish population will barely survive
3: You can do better
4-5: Nice job! The fish population will do very well
6-8: It's a few too many fish for the environment to handle... But great job!
8-12: You beat the developers!
over 12: How?!

Made by three people in three hours for Trijam #162 Programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3. Artwork was drawn by K. Haine using Krita. Music was composed by P. Haine using Garage Band. Sound effects were edited in Audacity.
